attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To stop adding interest on student loans for students in England.
Why should English students not only have to take a loan for there education but also pay interest while Scottish students get free grants.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop interest on student loans."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page22825


Prime Minister's Office
